name: EncounterLevel
description: This CodeSystem defines the encounter types through the different levels of granularity. It is aligned with the German encounter type CodeSystem of the MI Initiative.

concept.definition: Encounter defined on institution level. This is the most coarse grained encounter definition which would, in the inpatient area for example span from admission to discharge
Encounter defined on department level. This is a more detailed encounter definition where for each department change in the inpatient area a new encounter is defined.
Encounter defined on treatment level. This is the most detailed encounter definition where for each bed or room change in the inpatient area a new encounter is defined
